articles.title: Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants revealed: Three Indian eateries make the cut - The Indian Express
articles.description: Masque, Indian Accent and Avartana make it to Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants List
articles.content: The much-awaited list — Asias 50 Best Restaurants 2023 — is finally out, and three restaurants from India have made the cut!This year, Mumbais fine dining restaurant Masque rose from 21 (its rank las… [+2613 chars]
